ygData.subject: Heritrix Mobile Web Crawling
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello!  We are currently investigating adding mobile web crawling to Heritrix, something akin to what the Google crawler is now doing to discover web content

Hello!  We are currently investigating adding mobile web crawling to
Heritr=
ix, something akin to what the Google crawler is now doing to
discover web =
content made specifically for mobile web browsers.  We
are in the early sta=
ges of planning and want to make sure we are not
duplicating the efforts of=
 anyone else.  Please let us know if you
have any interest or input you wou=
ld like to contribute to this
effort. Thanks!
